title: Lumberjack Sion is someone who takes his job very seriously.
body:

NOTHING WILL STOP HIM FROM TRANSPORTING HIS FRESHLY CUT TIMBER!  NOT EVEN MORE TREES!

Honestly I can't decide which I like more, Barbarian or Lumberjack.
I'm sad about barbarian. He lost his rock hard nipples of justice.
GO SION GO! MAKE US PROUD OF YOU ASSISTING THE LUMBER INDUSTRY!!!
DON'T LET MAOKAI STOP YOU!!!!
Plot twist: the tree Sion is smashing in with his shoulder IS Maokai

I still wonder how many people get the tin man reference with Lumberjack Sion.

P.S. Lumberjax when?
Is it not obvious?

I mean it is but you never know.

Fuckin' hate the wizard of oz.
